room_title: Escape room "Bombsquad: It's All Wired!" by Xscape Escape Room Attraction in Hudson
room_description:
Players take on the role of government agents who have finally tracked down a crazed conspiracy theorist who hopes to destroy the city. As players enter his dingy unkempt apartment, they are greeted via video by the madman, who has trapped them inside!
To make things worse, the entire apartment is wired with an escalating series of complicated lethal devices! They must now prove their superior intelligence by disarming and overcoming all the lunatic's traps and doomsday machinery within 60 minutes... or the city is doomed!
